dcterms:creator: Philipp Koehn
dcterms:description: A parallel corpus for statistical machine translation, containing multilingual data from the European Parliament.
dcterms:title: Europarl

dcterms:creator: Eva Vanmassenhove
Christian Hardmeier
dcterms:description: Europarl datasets that include demographic speaker information, enhancing the parallel corpus with speaker attributes such as gender and age.
dcterms:title: Europarl Datasets with Demographic Speaker Information

dcterms:creator: Ella Rabinovich
Raj Nath Patel

dcterms:description: An annotated parallel dataset for English-French and English-German language pairs, focusing on preserving original author traits in machine translation.
dcterms:title: Annotated Parallel Dataset for EN–FR and EN–DE
